hero.tagline: The nobility of metal. The speed of digital.
hero.subtitle: From €500 to €75,000, get a decision in principle within 24h — no commitment, 100% online.

rejected.title: Rejected without explanation
rejected.description: Banks say no, but never why. You're left in the dark, not knowing how to improve your application.

waiting.title: 3 weeks of waiting
waiting.description: Appointments, paperwork, back and forth. While your project waits, the opportunity flies away.

number.title: Treated like a number
number.description: No support, no humanity. Just a file among thousands, processed by a cold algorithm.

atypical.title: Atypical profile = closed door
atypical.description: Freelancer, student, young professional? The banking system isn't made for you. Welcome to financial exclusion.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.subtitle: We tell you everything, even the uncomfortable parts
transparency.description: If we decline, we explain why. If we approve, we detail the terms. No hidden fees, no surprises. You know exactly where you stand.

speed.title: Speed
speed.subtitle: 24h means 24h, or less
speed.description: Promises are kept. Response within 24-48h maximum. Funds transferred almost instantly after approval. Your time is valuable, we respect it.

respect.title: Respect
respect.subtitle: For clients, for ourselves, for our commitments
respect.description: We support even those we decline. You're not a file number. Every application deserves attention and consideration.

pragmatism.title: Pragmatism
pragmatism.subtitle: Business first, no naivety
pragmatism.description: We're here to help, but we stay realistic. Clear terms, kept commitments. A win-win partnership.

response.label: Response time
response.description: Maximum guaranteed to process your request

hidden.label: Hidden fees
hidden.description: What's announced is what you pay

paragraphs.p1: Quickfund wasn't born from a personal dramatic story. No bank rejection, no desperate situation. Just a
paragraphs.p2Start: Credit players do things half-heartedly. Dehumanized business, clients treated as numbers, broken promises.
paragraphs.p3Start: From Estonia, a digital pioneer, we're building credit as it should be:

quote.text: "We'll be charitable when we're profitable. Until then, we build."
quote.author: — The Founder

vision.title: Our vision
vision.intro: A clear roadmap, measured ambitions, rigorous execution.

today.title: The foundations
today.description: Structure, optimize, prove the model in Estonia.

tenYears.title: The reference
tenYears.description: Leader in transparent credit for the system's excluded.

response.title: Response in 24-48h
response.description: No weeks of waiting. We commit, we deliver.

explanation.title: Systematic explanation
explanation.description: Approved or declined, you'll always know why.

support.title: Real support
support.description: Personalized follow-up, even after the decision.

noFees.title: Zero hidden fees
noFees.description: What's announced is what you pay. Period.

guaranteed.title: Guaranteed approval
guaranteed.description: We evaluate each case honestly. Sometimes, the answer is no.

rates.title: Miraculous rates
rates.description: Our rates are fair, not unrealistic. Risk has a price.

charity.title: To do charity
charity.description: We're a business, not an NGO. But an ethical business.

promise.honestyQuote: "Trust is built on honesty, not on beautiful promises."

cta.title: Try credit
cta.subtitle: Free simulation, no commitment.
cta.subtitleEnd: Discover why thousands of clients trust us.
